posts.title: Hezbollah on Sunday confirmed the death of high-ranking official Nabil Kaouk
posts.body: Hezbollah's deputy leader has vowed to continue fighting Israel

posts.title: People scream, run off Bihar bridge as Kosi river water rises amid floods
posts.body: With heavy rains causing severe flooding in Bihar, a video shows people fleeing a bridge as the Kosi river swells.

posts.title: Sebi Board Meeting: Regulator approves new asset class for HNIs with riskier appetite
posts.body: The Securities and Exchange Board of India will hold a crucial board meeting on Monday
